page.title: 13Children's Pastimes
page.content:
The children say that the thing they most dislike about living in this area is that there are not enough friends living nearby. Some of them often feel isolated and lonely.
Their favourite games are football, riding bicycles, and a game called Elastics. This is played by making a series of jumps in and out of a large loop of elastic. They also enjoy looking for creatures in the stream, in holes in dry stone walls, and in hedges, fields and woods. When the snow falls, they use sledges and plastic sacks for tobogganing on the slopes.
Children's pets include ponies, dogs, cats, rabbits, ferrets, goats, ducks, tropical fish, budgerigars and canaries.
